LanguageData.EggHydraFertilized.label: hydra egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggHydraFertilized.description: Fertilized hydra egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby hydra. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggHydraUnFertilized.label: hydra egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggHydraUnFertilized.description: Unfertilized hydra egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.Hydra.label: Hydra
LanguageData.Hydra.description: A five-headed snakelike reptile. Their brutal and lethal heads, giant size, venomous teeth make them apex predators of jungle.
LanguageData.Hydra.tools.First_head_bite.label: First head bite
